title: THE KING OF FIGHTERS 15 Directly Download
description:
THE KING OF FIGHTERS 15 (KOF XV) game for free instantly and play pre-installed on SteamRIP
Since its debut in 1994, the KOF fighting game series has been driving the world to new heights of excitement with its appealing characters and unique game system. Six years have passed since the last title in the series, and now KOF XV surpasses all of its predecessors in terms of graphics, systems, and online experience Classic popular characters, heroes and villains revived from the dead, new challengers , and more The most epic dream match in KOF history is about to begin The latest KOF Saga continues from the previous title in Story Mode.
This time, the story is coming to an explosive climax Inheriting the series’ traditional 3-on-3 team battle, KOF XV also features the exciting new “ SHATTER STRIKE ” mechanic. Enjoy an unprecedented sense of speed and hype fighting game action KOF XV features rollback netcode. There are also a variety of battle options that allow you to choose how you want to play Includes a Gallery with movies and voice samples, and a new DJ STATION with over 300 popular songs from the KOF series and more. SHIPS AT WAR

system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 770 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 3GB
